meanings.definition: A picture, description, or imitation of a person or thing in which certain striking characteristics are exaggerated in order to create a comic or grotesque effect.
meanings.sent1: The artist drew funny caricatures of the guests at the party.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy looking at caricatures of famous people in magazines.
meanings.sent3: The caricatures at the art show made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her exaggerated caricatures brought life to the characters.
meanings.sent5: The caricatures in the comic book were so exaggerated, they made me giggle.

meanings.definition: To make or give a caricature of; represent in caricature.
meanings.sent1: She caricatures her friends in her cartoons for fun.
meanings.sent2: The artist caricatures politicians to highlight their features.
meanings.sent3: He caricatures his boss in a playful way in his sketches.
meanings.sent4: The comedian caricatures famous actors in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent5: The artist caricatures reality to create a humorous effect in his work.
